page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: THIS AREA HAS A HIGHER THAN AVERAGE PERCENTAGE OF{RESIDENTS OVER 75 YEARS OF AGE.ALMOST 20% OF ALL{HOUSEHOLDS ARE COMPRISED OF{PENSIONERS}LIVING ALONE. THIS COMPARES WITH A BOROUGH AVERAGE OF 15%. AN ADDIIONAL 11% OF HOUSEHOLDS ARE COMPRISED OF TWO OR MORE PENSIONERS GIVING A TOTAL OF 41% OF HOUSEHOLD UNITS BEING OCCUPIED EXCLUSIVELY BY O.A.P'S. AMONG THIS ELDER POPULATION THERE ARE A SMALL NUMBER OF HOME OWNERS. A RELATIVELY HIGH PERCENTAGE OF PENSIONERS ARE{WARNER}TENANTS.{WARNER BELONGED TO A LOCAL WEALTHY FAMILY. HE HAD THE HOUSES AND FLATS BUILT IN THE 1880'S TO HOUSE THE{NAVVIES}WHO WERE BUILDING THE{RESERVOIRS}IN THE{LEA {VALLEY.}THEY ARE OF NOTE TO THIS DAY BECAUSE THEY ARE VERY SOUGHT AFTER PROPERTIES FOR{PRIVATE OWNERSHIP.}THEY HAVE BEEN ON SALE FOR SOME YEARS AND
